title: Clash team Gold only
body:
Well.. clash is here and i would like a team of golds to compete and give it our best
currently i can play top and mid 
but i can play either one if we get a full team of people 
lets give it our best and not be toxic we are here to win and we cant do that if we dont put our egos aside and be willing to learn and trust each other
also please have a mic its soo much better than typing add me ( Lightt )
